definition[0]: not having enough money to pay what you owe
example[0]: The company was later declared insolvent  (=officially said to be insolvent).
definition[1]: a person or company that is insolvent does not have enough money or ASSETs to pay their debts
example[1]: The company has now been declared insolvent.
example[2]: The bank could be rendered insolvent by such a large payment.
